txt.en: You have collected the ingredients for which Sâghlem asked. You should bring them to him in the kitchen of The Cracked Flagon in Furtherholm.
Sâghlem, the cook at The Cracked Flagon, is running low on a few key ingredients.

'Ya hoi, my friend. What brings you into my kitchen? Khâtaphos sent you? Ah, that is our captain, always looking out for the crew!

'If you are keen on lending a hand, I do have an important task for you. I am running very low on certain ingredients that can be found right here on the island. I need more herbs. They are leafy and bushy and are easy to spot. They also smell delicious! I need lemons, the big juicy ones, ripened on the tree. I also need olives. Many handfuls if you please!

'You can find all of these here on the island, growing on the slopes well above the beach.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
Sâghlem has asked you to collect three ingredients that grow on the slopes that rise above Furtherholm.
'Ah yes, I could smell the herbs before I even saw you coming! I will take those. Thank you for your help! Here is a reward for your effort.'
